definitions.definition: Any of the several species of plant in the genus Taraxacum , characterised by yellow flower heads and notched, broad-ended leaves , especially the common dandelion ( Taraxacum officinale ).
The flower head or fruiting head of the dandelion plant.
A yellow colour , like that of the flower.

main_definition: ( countable ) Any of the several species of plant in the genus Taraxacum , characterised by yellow flower heads and notched, broad-ended leaves , especially the common dandelion ( Taraxacum officinale ).
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) The flower head or fruiting head of the dandelion plant.
( uncountable ) A yellow colour , like that of the flower.
